::Orchestra::

    As soon as Orchestra saw Chameleon walking out of the CR=
 Chamber, he had a new plan.  He put his gun away.  Orchestra spun out from=
 the wall he was against and showed up in front of Chameleon.

    "Hey!  B=
uddy, in case you don't know, my name's Orchestra.  You must be Chameleon. =
 Hey, let's go somewhere, sit down and chat, get to know eachother better,"=
 Orchestra said as kindly as he could, and put out his hand for Chameleon t=
o shake.
